room_title: Escape room "Timeline" by Lockbox Escape Room in Miami
room_description: A massive nuclear explosion released a deadly toxin in the air. The population is on the verge of extinction. Before giving in to the toxin, your father has locked you in a safety bunker. Searching the basement, you stumble upon a message which reveals that your grandfather was the lead scientist on the project responsible for the explosion. Your father has then build a time machine to go back and try to prevent the leak. Now you have a chance to go back in time and alter the past in order to save the future.
